verse: The word of Adonai that came to Hosea son of Beeri, in the days of Uzziah, Jotham, Ahaz and Hezekiah, kings of Judah, and in the days of Jeroboam son of Joash, king of Israel.
When Adonai first spoke with Hosea, Adonai said to Hosea:
So he went and took Gomer the daughter of Diblaim, and she conceived and bore him a son.
Then she conceived again, and bore a daughter. And He said to him:
After she weaned Lo-ruhamah, she conceived and bore a son.
